LanguageData.VPE_SteelConstruct.label: steel construct
LanguageData.VPE_SteelConstruct.description: A piece of steel slag, animated by powerful psychic energy. It will engage nearby threats and defend the master from any harm that may come to them.\n\n<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color>Constructs generate constant heat for the caster that summoned them. Keeping too many constructs alive could prevent the psycaster from casting other abilities.
LanguageData.VPE_SteelConstruct.tools.0.label: head
LanguageData.VPE_RockConstruct.label: rock construct
LanguageData.VPE_RockConstruct.description: A piece of rock chunk, animated by powerful psychic energy. It will do simple work around the colony tirelessly and with maximum dedication.\n\n<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color>Constructs generate constant heat for the caster that summoned them. Keeping too many constructs alive could prevent the psycaster from casting other abilities.
LanguageData.VPE_RockConstruct.tools.0.label: head
